intro: Holothrix usambarae, commonly known as the Usambara holothrix, is a rare and endemic plant species found in the Usambara Mountains of Tanzania. It belongs to the family Asteraceae and is characterized by its unique, hairy foliage and small, daisy-like flowers. The plant thrives in moist, shaded environments, typically in forest understories.
